info.name: Abyss for Google (No longer maintained)
info.description:
A dark theme for google that uses brightly colored fonts.

I don't use Google anymore, so I have no reason to update this.
info.additionalInfo: I built this theme alongside the firefox theme FT DeepDark by steva, so it would probably look best with that theme. There are also a few bugs and stuff still present, however most dont affect the functionality of google and I plan to fix them when I get the time. Google has been changing their css a lot lately which screws up some of the colors. I will to push fixes to these issues whenever possible. This theme has been tested on firefox for linux and windows. I am not a chrome user so issues with chrome wont be noticed/fixed as often. If you see an error, state the specifics of the error in the comments below (saying "it doesnt work" doesnt give me enough info to fix the issue) Changelog: >06/26/17 - V1.4.1   *Small fix for chrome users (long overdue I know)   *Other google domains now work >01/27/17 - V1.4.0   *Fixed some colors   *Made advanced search and search settings usable   *Visited links now use a lighter purple >01/27/17 - V1.3.5   *Colored currency calculator   *Adjusted for changes in google UI >01/21/17 - V1.3.4   *Made google translate even more usable   *Added color to some small areas that I missed >01/10/17 - V1.3.3   *Improved disease css   *Added stopwatch/timer css   *Hotfixed google translate (its now legible)   *Minor fixes >12/19/16 - V1.3.2   *Made a few adjustments for new google ui >09/29/16 - V1.2.0   *Added movie css   *Added calculator css   *Added music css   *Apps now highlight on mouse hover in the google apps box   *Fixed minor coloring bugs   *Added color to more popups   *Got rid of the button shadow   *Fixed some login div colors >09/14/16 - V1.1.1   *Fixed the colors of some popups   *Fixed some divs that displayed as white   *Fixed some issues with icon colors >09/03/16 - V1.1.0:   *Fixed login CSS   *Added button and search bar glow   *Search bar border now changes on mouse hover >09/03/16 - V1.0.0:   *Theme released!
